import { useContext } from 'react' import { ResponsiveContainer, LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, } from 'recharts' import { Context } from '../../../../context' import './chart.scss' const data = [ { name: 'Mon', progress: 2 }, { name: 'Tue', progress: 5 }, { name: 'Wed', progress: 7 }, { name: 'Thu', progress: 3 }, { name: 'Fri', progress: 8 }, { name: 'Sat', progress: 4 }, { name: 'Sun', progress: 9 }, ] const Chart = () => { const { darkMode } = useContext(Context) return (
) } export default Chart
